title: Start
body:
<<set $event to 0>>
<<set $distance to 0>>
<<set $food to 100>>
<<set $crew to 20>>
Arr!
Ye be on a ship, matey!
What wish ye t' de?
[[Keep sailing.|sailing]]
[[Stop at an island.|island]]

title: sailing
body:
<<set $distance to $distance + ($crew * 2)>>
<<set $food to $food - $crew>>
<<if $food < 1>>
<<set $food to 0>>
<<set $crew to $crew - 5>>
<<if $crew < 1>>
Game over! Better luck next time.
<<else>>
Your crew are starving and unhappy.
Scurvy Bob is trying to harpoon a seagull.
There are tears in his eyes.
[[What next?|choice]]
<<endif>>
<<endif>>
<<if $food > 0>>
You are sailing. 
Your crew start to sing a sea shanty.
The rum is passed round.
<<if $distance < 1000>>
[[What next?|choice]]
<<else>>
SUCCESS!!! You win the game.
<<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: choice
body:
You are on a ship.
[[Keep sailing.|sailing]]
[[Stop at an island|island]]
